title: Decoding Culture: Men, Women, Sex & Power
description:
Are the culture wars fuelled by the clash between the masculine and the feminine? How do we navigate the narrative battle over how we define sex, gender and power?

In this episode of Decoding Culture, Alexander Beiner is joined by Rachel Haywire (author of The New Art Right), Ian MacKenzie (host of the Mythic Masculine podcast) and Raven Connolly (co-host of The Philosopher Queens) to try and make sense of the dynamic between the sexes and how it erupts from the internet into the real world.

Find out more about this episode's guests below:

Rachel Haywire - rachelhaywire.substack.com 
Raven Connolly - @spiral_virus on Twitter
Ian Mackenzie - http://themythicmasculine.com

Join our Digital Campfire to participate in live Q&A's and Wisdom Gyms - more info on https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
